mapper.insert:
insert into url_click (id, url_id, browser, browser_type, browser_major_version, device_type, platform, platform_version, created_ts, user_ip)
values( #{id}, #{url_id}, #{browser}, #{browser_type}, #{browser_major_version}, #{device_type}, #{platform}, #{platform_version}, #{created_ts}, #{user_ip} )

insert into url_click (id, url_id, browser, browser_type, browser_major_version, device_type, platform, platform_version, created_ts, user_ip)
values
( #{item.id}, #{item.url_id}, #{item.browser}, #{item.browser_type}, #{item.browser_major_version}, #{item.device_type}, #{item.platform}, #{item.platform_version}, #{item.created_ts}, #{item.user_ip} )
